# Badge

- Go to badge menu showing badge list page. There is default showing 10 rows. 

<img src="../../admin/badge-list.png" />

-	When we need to add badge click Add badge button. Now showing Add badge page. 

<img src="../../admin/add-badge.png" />

-	Enter valid badge details and click submit button.

-	Once badge created successfully return to badge page. This created badge showing in the list.

<img src="../../admin/badge-list1.png" />

-	Anything actions needed in the badge list use action column edit icon and delete icon.
-	Edit icon use to update the badge details.
-	Delete icon used to delete this badge. 

### REST API

<dl>
  <dd>Name: **Badge List**</dd>
  <dd>Method: **POST**</dd>
  <dd>Headers: Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CRG6dX11JKksEmWXFoM08D4LXmKoyMzodfJodODrWEk</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
  <dd>Body:</dd>
  ```javascript {3} copy
{
    "variables": {
        "input": {
            "paginate": {
                "offset": 0,
                "limit": 10,
                "sort": {
                    "key": false,
                    "sortKey": "",
                    "sortType": true
                },
                "search": {
                    "key": false,
                    "searchKey": "all",
                    "searchValue": ""
                }
            }
        }
    },
    "query": "query ($input: BadgeListRequest) {\n  getBadgeList(input: $input) {\n    responseCode\n    data\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
} 
```
</dl>

<dl>
  <dd>Name: **Create Badge**</dd>
  <dd>Method: **POST**</dd>
  <dd>Headers: Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CRG6dX11JKksEmWXFoM08D4LXmKoyMzodfJodODrWEk</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
  <dd>Body:</dd>
  ```javascript {3} copy
{
  "variables":{
    "input":{
      "body":{
        "name":"Start",
        "code":"001",
        "thumbFiles":[null],
        "imageAttachment":[null],
        "imageUrl":"",
        "status":1}
      }
    },
  "query":"mutation ($input: CreateBadgeRequest) {\n  createBadge(input: $input) {\n    responseCode\n    data\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
} 
```
</dl>

<dl>
  <dd>Name: **Get Badge ById**</dd>
  <dd>Method: **POST**</dd>
  <dd>Headers: Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CRG6dX11JKksEmWXFoM08D4LXmKoyMzodfJodODrWEk</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
  <dd>Body:</dd>
  ```javascript {3} copy
{
    "variables": {
        "input": {
            "_id": "652fca8277d44ebded0d3674"
        }
    },
    "query": "query ($input: GetBadgeByIdRequest) {\n  getBadgeById(input: $input) {\n    responseCode\n    data\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
} 
```
</dl>

<dl>
  <dd>Name: **Update Badge**</dd>
  <dd>Method: **POST**</dd>
  <dd>Headers: Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CRG6dX11JKksEmWXFoM08D4LXmKoyMzodfJodODrWEk</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
  <dd>Body:</dd>
  ```javascript {3} copy
{
    "variables": {
        "input": {
            "_id": "652fca8277d44ebded0d3674",
            "body": {
                "_id": "652fca8277d44ebded0d3674",
                "name": "Start",
                "code": "001",
                "createdBy": "652fb7953bb12d581a57b480",
                "badgeImageUrl": "https://crypken-bucket.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/development/signature/badge/3eab4198-f7d4-4f2b-968b-c99e538fc642",
                "status": 1,
                "createdAt": "2023-10-18T12:07:30.742Z",
                "updatedAt": "2023-10-18T12:07:30.742Z",
                "__v": 0,
                "thumbFiles": [],
                "imageAttachment": [],
                "imageUrl": "https://crypken-bucket.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/development/signature/badge/3eab4198-f7d4-4f2b-968b-c99e538fc642"
            }
        }
    },
    "query": "mutation ($input: UpdateBadgeRequest) {\n  updateBadge(input: $input) {\n    responseCode\n    data\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
} 
```
</dl>

<dl>
  <dd>Name: **Delete Badge**</dd>
  <dd>Method: **POST**</dd>
  <dd>Headers: Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CRG6dX11JKksEmWXFoM08D4LXmKoyMzodfJodODrWEk</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
  <dd>Body:</dd>
  ```javascript {3} copy
{
    "variables": {
        "input": {
            "_id": "640adb52792e7f9a9148acbd"
        }
    },
    "query": "mutation ($input: DeleteBadgeByIdRequest) {\n  deleteBadgeById(input: $input) {\n    responseCode\n    data\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
}
```
</dl>
